name: 1st Person Overcooked
description:
How to play:

  • Create/join a room based on the room name
  • Build the dishes as shown on the recipes at the top of the screen
  • Cut the avocado and cheese, cook the meat and bread
  • Make sure to build dishes on a plate, which can be grabbed from the cupboard
  • When finished with a dish, deliver it to the customer sitting at the table
  • Enjoy
